title: Compile a Regulatory Submission Dossier
description: A regulatory affairs specialist must compile documents for an Investigational New Drug (IND) application.

tasks.description: Retrieve the required document list for an IND submission from a template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a checklist of all necessary documents (e.g., preclinical data, CMC info, protocol).

tasks.description: Gather all final, approved documents from the document management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates and retrieves all required documents.

tasks.description: Assemble the documents into the eCTD (electronic Common Technical Document) format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly places each document in the appropriate section of the eCTD structure.

tasks.description: Perform a validation check on the compiled eCTD package to ensure it meets regulatory technical specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a validation tool and confirms there are no errors.
